Brief description of the task.

More detailed explanation of what needs to be done.

Implementation hints, relevant files, dependencies.

## Priority
- [ ] P0 - Critical (do now)
- [ ] P1 - High (this sprint)

- [ ] P3 - Low (backlog)

- [ ] Medium (2-8 hours)
- [ ] Large (1-3 days)
- [ ] XL (> 3 days)
